Text: Enron Benefits StatementSteve please have your admin make x copies of the various sections of your benefits statement and fax it to me I will look through it for possible scenarios Regards David Original Message From Kean Steven J mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject Thanks for the information It looks like I have a sizable additional tax bill Am I missing something Do I have Enron stock I can sell to offset these gains eg in my savings plan matching Other ideas This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Equity Rebalancing Cc If we sell all of the following mutual funds in HME Munder Money Market Munder Net Net MFS Emerging Growth Pimco Growth Putman Voyager That should bring available cash for equities to We can open a new managed account with a Large Cap Value manager NWQ and fund it with We can add to HME bringing the account balance to appx and replace the manager with Newbridge a different large cap growth We can add the remaining to HME bringing the account balance to appx and replace the manager with Fayez a different core manager After all the dust settles the accounts should look like Fayez Core SP Newbridge Large Cap Growth NWQ Large Cap Value We will drop the documents of at the front desk on Wednesday Regards David L Shine Vice PresidentInvestments UBS PaineWebber Bagby Suite Houston Texas Direct Toll Free Fax OLEObj Notice Regarding Entry of Orders and Instructions Please do not transmit orders andor instructions regarding your UBSPaineWebber accounts by email Orders andor instructions transmitted by email will not be accepted by UBSPaineWebber and UBSPaineWebber will not be responsible for carrying out such orders andor instructions Notice Regarding Privacy and Confidentiality UBSPaineWebber reserves the right to monitor and review the content of all email communications sent andor received by its employees
